channel.title: Codewars on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in Codewars on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Filter out the geese (Codewars — 8kyu)
item.description: Here’s a link to the Codewars Kata: codewars.com/kata/57ee4a67108d3fd9eb0000e7/.. The goal of this exercise is to get back an array without some specific elements in it (elements that are specified in the geese array).

item.title: Converting strings into camelCased strings
item.description: While doing my homework, I encountered an exciting exercise. The goal was to write a function that changes words like “add four subtract six” into camel-cased “addFourSubtractSix”.
